entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mississauga
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 1:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 54 %
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: WNW 31 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
